name: Send Infobip SMSes from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically retrieves new rows from a Google Sheets spreadsheet and sends them as Infobip SMSes. Once the SMS is sent, a timestamp is added into the spreadsheet.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eF3pn9YPujuPmSqT4wiquN3jngv2i6slJ6quiyyjabE/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a source. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change this after you set up the template.
